message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 12-3-1b, translated into all languages

data.en: The United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) was mandated as Custodian Agencies for indicator 12.3.1(b) by the Inter-agency and Expert Group on SDG Indicators. In addition, the United Nations Environment Assembly urged Member States to establish mechanisms for measuring food loss and waste, and requested support in providing technical assistance that would allow countries to make measure and make progress.
